abstract: Campbell Soup will reorganize its business into product divisions instead of geographic or brand groups, as it confronts falling soup sales.
lead_paragraph: The company said it would reorganize its business into product divisions instead of geographic or brand groups.
snippet: The company said it would reorganize its business into product divisions instead of geographic or brand groups.

headline.main: Campbell Soup Revamps to Counter Slow Sales
headline.print_headline: Campbell Soup Revamps to Counter Slow Sales
